mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT TASK_ID as scheduleId , SCHEDULE_TYPE as executionCycle , EXECUTION_TIME as executionTime , KEYWORD_COUNT as keywordCount , CONTENT_COUNT as publishCount , AI_MODEL as aiModel , IS_ACTIVE as isActive , CREATED_AT as createdAt , CASE WHEN NEXT_EXECUTION IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE TO_CHAR(NEXT_EXECUTION, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS nextExecutionAt FROM ADMIN.SCHEDULED_TASKS ORDER BY TASK_ID ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rn > #{startRow}
